screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google Play Store page for the Duolingo app. The app description highlights its focus on language lessons, offering ads and in-app purchases. The page also includes buttons for "Uninstall" and "Open" and displays app suggestions like TIDAL Music, Airbnb, and Calm. At the bottom, additional apps such as "Home Workout" and "The Weather Channel" are recommended.
history_actions: click on the "Play Store" icon located at the right and lower part of the screen.

think_action.Thought: The current screen is showing the Duolingo app on the Google Play Store. However, the user has requested to uninstall the 'Lyft' app, which is not visible on this screen. The next logical step is to navigate back to the home screen or the app drawer to locate the Lyft app, as it is not visible on the current screen.
Future Action Plan: Navigate back to the home screen or app drawer to locate the Lyft app.
Once found, locate the 'Lyft' app, long press on it, and select the 'Uninstall' option.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Press the home button to return to the home screen.
